DOC.brief_summary: 5D and 2D ultrasound will be done to normal pregnant women between 37 to 42 weeks gestation and fetal weight will be estimated using the hadlock formula using biometry measured by both ultrasounds. Accuracy of 5D ultrasound in determining fetal weight will be determined.
DOC.brief_title: 5D LB Ultrasound in Determination of Fetal Weight in Normal Pregnancy : A Pilot Study
DOC.criteria: 2040years singleton pregnancy normal pregnancy Intrauterine fetal death multiple pregnancy congenital anomaly nonvisualized fetal parts by ultrasound maternal medical disorders like diabetes and hypertension
